doc.title: Girl's Frolic at the Lake
doc.plot: A number of girls are seated on the bank of a lake waiting for chums they expect in a boat. The boat appears and a young man and his sweetheart are the only occupants. They are apparently so engaged with their own pleasure and conversation that they do not notice the girls on the bank, who are calling to be taken aboard. The girls finally become exasperated, spring into the water, swim to the boat and upset it, throwing the couple into the water.
